db:section.db:title: Detailed Description

db:warning.db:para: All pre-made standalone effects in QtQuick3D.Effects are considered deprecated starting with Qt 6.5. To apply FXAA to the scene, use ExtendedSceneEnvironment instead.

db:section.db:para: The FXAA effect applies fast approximate anti-aliasing to the scene. FXAA is a high-speed anti-aliasing technique that removes some of the artifacts from the image without impacting performance as heavily as super-sampling would.

db:listitem.db:para: Easy fix for many aliasing problems.
Can blur and distort fine text details.
As a screen-space heuristic technique, it can sometimes leave sharp edges that ideally would be anti-aliased.

db:section.db:para: Fxaa does not have adjustable properties.
